title: Linux smbclient Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the smbclient command in Linux, learn how to connect to Windows shares, list files and directories, and perform practical operations.

meta.title: Linux smbclient Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the smbclient command in Linux, learn how to connect to Windows shares, list files and directories, and perform practical operations.
meta.keywords: smbclient, Linux, Windows share, file management, network communication

verify.name: Verify smbclient installation
verify.hint: Please ensure that the smbclient package is installed correctly. You can run the `smbclient --version` command to verify the installation.

steps.title: Connect to a Windows Share Using smbclient

verify.name: Verify smbclient connection
verify.hint: Please ensure that you have the correct UNC path, username, and password for the Windows share. You can try running the `smbclient //windows-server/share -U username%password -c 'ls'` command to verify the connection.

steps.title: List Files and Directories on a Windows Share

verify.name: Verify file and directory listing
verify.hint: Please ensure that you have the correct UNC path, username, and password for the Windows share. You can try running the `smbclient //windows-server/share -U username%password -c 'ls'` command to verify the file and directory listing.
